QuestData.Title: Honoring Our Ancestors
QuestData.Description:
Our ancestors walk beside us upon the winds of Ohn'ahra, guiding and protecting us. All Maruuk, dead and living, gather under truce at the Khural.
The scent of this meal calls the ancestors to our fire. When they arrive, the Khural begins.
QuestData.LogDescription: Help Qariin Dotur cook a meal for the ancestors.
QuestData.RewardText: Our ancestors risked much for our future. It is right to invite them to gather alongside us.
